property.name: description
property.value: After [[Kris]] creates a [[Dark Fountain]] in the [[Dreemurr Residence]] living room, they and [[Susie]] wake up in the Couch Cliffs. Susie declares this to be another adventure, and the two continue forward.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] reunites with [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] adter sensing the [[Dark World]]'s creation. The three pose together and continue forward.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] tells [[Ralsei]] about some of the movies she watched on TV. Ralsei admits that he had never watched a movie before.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] asks [[Raksei]] if he would want to watch movies with her and [[Kris]]. Ralsei hesitantly agrees that it would be nice.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] suggests that [[Ralsei]] come to school with her and [[Kris]] so that he could do their homework. Ralsei appreciates the offer.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] suggests that [[Ralsei]] should go to the Festival with her and [[Kris]]. Ralsei says that he would love to go.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] explains that he is appreciative of [[Susie]]'s offers. He begins to say something else, but he is hesitant.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] explains that, due to the nature of being a [[Darkner]], he cannot enter the Light World with [[Kris]] and [[Susie]]. He explains that Darkners are simply inanimate objects given form by the [[Dark Fountains]], and the [[Dark Worlds]] are illusions brought about by removing light. Susie objects to Ralsei's claim that Darkners are not real, reaffirming their friendship.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Tenna]] interrupts [[Susie]] and [[Ralsei]]'s conversation and introduces himself as a game show host. He declares his desire to subject the [[party]] to his games.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] and [[Ralsei]] occupy the left and right switches respectively. [[Kris]] must press the middle switch to unlock the way forward.

property.name: description
property.value: The party must simultaneously step on the highlighted pressure plates to unlock the way forward. Here, the order of appearance is ''right'', ''bottom and left'', ''bottom and right''.

properties.property: A stale wind... you stifle a sneeze. You are filled with the power of not sneezing.

property.name: description
property.value: A sleeping couch. If [[Kris]] and [[Susie]] walk past the couch and come back, the couch wakes up and walks to the left. If the player has a completed [[Chapter 3]] SAVE file, Kris can sleep on the couch, which walks them directly to the first round of ''[[The Legend of Tenna]]''.

property.name: description
property.value: A [[Shuttah]] hand plays a camera sound effect when the [[party]] slides past.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Susie]] proposes the idea that [[Ralsei]] could do any puzzles that she and [[Kris]] may find in the Light World.

property.name: description
property.value: [[Ralsei]] directs [[Kris]] to the switch in the middle and advises them to press it.
